Key Match Events: Alperen Şengün delivered a standout performance with 23 points, 6 rebounds, 4 assists, and 5 steals in 37 minutes.
Jalen Green tallied 22 points, Dillon Brooks added 19, and rookie Cam Whitmore chipped in 18 points to support Şengün's effort.
Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists in just under 30 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Houston Rockets continued their impressive run in the NBA, defeating the Dallas Mavericks 110-99.
The Denver Nuggets now boast a 19-8 record, while the Atlanta Hawks fell to 16-13.
The New York Knicks claimed their ninth consecutive victory, outclassing the Utah Jazz 119-103.
Others: The game was played at Toyota Center in Houston, Texas, U.S.
Quentin Grimes contributed 17 points for the Dallas Mavericks.
Klay Thompson and Kyrie Irving each scored 16 points for the Mavericks.
